name: NSPasteboardItemDataProvider
desc: A set of methods implemented by the data provider of a pasteboard item to provide the data for a particular UTI type.

items.name: func pasteboard(NSPasteboard?, item: NSPasteboardItem, provideDataForType: NSPasteboard.PasteboardType)
items.desc: Asks the receiver to provide data for a specified type to a given pasteboard.

items.name: func pasteboardFinishedWithDataProvider(NSPasteboard)
items.desc: Informs the receiver that the pasteboard no longer needs the data provider for any of its pasteboard items.
